document_data.mainbody:
Xullrae Dhuurniv was the youngest of the Matron Sisters of House Dhuurniv involved in the Zhent invasion of Shadowdale in the Year of Risen Elfkin, 1375 DR.
Although Xullrae allied together with her sisters with the Zhentarim the Matron Sisters had plots in minds different from the objective of the Zhent and the Sharrans the true plan of Xullrae was recreate a swarm of spider fire, an ancient kind of spider, and unleash them in the Cormanthor forest to burn it down.
